name: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔
bio: 二战盟军欧洲最高统帅，美国第34任总统。指挥诺曼底登陆等重大战役。任总统期间推动建设州际公路系统，在冷战中采取遏制政策。离任时警告军工复合体的危险。
bio_en: Thirty-fourth President and Supreme Commander of Allied Forces in Europe during WWII. Planned and executed the D-Day invasion of Normandy. As President, he ended the Korean War, launched the Interstate Highway System, enforced school desegregation at Little Rock, and warned of the military-industrial complex in his farewell address.

personalEvents.title: 指挥诺曼底登陆
personalEvents.description: 作为盟军最高统帅指挥D-Day登陆
personalEvents.description_en: As Supreme Allied Commander, directs the D-Day landings at Normandy

personalEvents.title: 就任总统
personalEvents.description: 当选第34任总统，结束朝鲜战争
personalEvents.description_en: Elected 34th President; ends the Korean War
